name: A cat's Journey
description:
The poor cat wondered off far from home to take a nap now its up to you to get him home?  But how did we get here with no issues but now everything is getting in the way home.

game uses a limited colour palate since that was the limitation set for the game jam so had fun trying to make anything look decent sad thing is we have more colours then the original game boy and my pixel art looks like pre nes style in some cases at least I think so lol.

I was only able to get to level 3 made to many hang ups on enemy ai and working on the bosses will mostly likely keep plugging away at it till I get the games 4 levels done over the week.
